constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 114 (Wednesday, June 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MURPHY of North Carolina:
H.R. 4278.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H3581]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on how direct-to-consumer pharmaceutical advertising negatively impacts drug costs to consumers, and for other purposes.
